data.name: X-Plane 10 AddOn - Carenado - C208B Grand Caravan
data.detailed_description:
NOTE: THE MAIN GAME X-PLANE 10 IS NOT AVAILABLE ANYMORE! PLEASE ONLY PURCHASE DLCS WHEN YOU ARE ALREADY OWNER OF X-PLANE 10!


The Carenado line of aircraft has been well acclaimed by users and reviewers for many years and for good reason. They are well constructed, looks good and have impeccable behavior in flight. The cockpits are accurate and well equipped.

Features


  • Interactive virtual cockpit
  • Original KFC150 autopilot installed
  • Original HQ digital stereo sounds (44.1 KHz) recorded from the original PT6 engine
  • GNS430 installed
  • 2D windows: Field of view, door manager and generaloptions for controlling cargo pod, statics elements and VC windows transparency
  • Full moving parts: Ailerons, elevators, rudders, flaps, rolling wheels
  • Highly detailed animations, such as doors, ladders, fully articulated sun visors, etc.
  • Realistic exterior lights and night lighting effects: Navigation lights, beacons, landing lights
  • Realistic light effects on gauges
  • 3D modeled and animated pilot figures
  • Highly detailed and optimized 3D cockpit area
  • IFR certification
  • Many details such as: pitot, antennas, chocks, pitot cover, baggage area.
  • Realistic textures and original paint designs.
  • Accurately reproduced flight characteristics
  • Real weight and balance.
  • Toggle yoke visibility in virtual cockpit
  • New Night light effects
  • New Prop disc effect
  • Cameras and viewpoints change system
  • New plug-in controlled 3D sounds
  • Includes improved default X-Plane 10.30 GNS430
  • NEW! Scroll wheel support
  • DDS textures for faster load times and optimization

Included in the package


  • C208B Super Cargomaster Expansion Pack
  • 8 HD Liveries
  • 2 HD Blank Llivery
  • Normal and Emergency Procedures PDF
  • Reference document PDF
  • Virtual Cockpit Description PDF
  • KFC150 Autopilot PDF
  • Recommended Settings PDF
  • General Information PDF

data.short_description: Carenado introduces the C208B Grand Caravan, a single engine turboprop servicing cargo and up to 14 passengers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with 2 GB of on-board, dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version 10.6.8 or later
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
